2.name: wordpress/is-your-server-ready-for-wordpress-32
2.description:
Is your site ready for WordPress 3.5? If your not sure your web server meets the minimum requirements for 3.5 this plugin will let you know. The plugin is is to be used at the user's own risk. I will not respond to inquiries or be updating the plugin on a regular basis.

Main Functions

  • Checks that your running the minimum MySQL and PHP versions required by WordPress 3.5
